verses.plain: O come, let us sing unto the LORD: let us make a joyful noise to the rock of our salvation.

tokens.t: O come, let us sing unto the
: let us make a joyful noise to the rock of our salvation.

verses.plain: Let us come before his presence with thanksgiving, and make a joyful noise unto him with psalms.

tokens.t: Let us come before his presence with thanksgiving, and make a joyful noise unto him with psalms.

verses.plain: For the LORD is a great God, and a great King above all gods.

tokens.t: For the
a great God, and a great King above all gods.

verses.plain: In his hand are the deep places of the earth: the strength of the hills is his also.

tokens.t: In his hand
the deep places of the earth: the strength of the hills
his also.

verses.plain: The sea is his, and he made it: and his hands formed the dry land.

tokens.t: The sea
his, and he made it: and his hands formed the dry

verses.plain: O come, let us worship and bow down: let us kneel before the LORD our maker.

tokens.t: O come, let us worship and bow down: let us kneel before the
our maker.

verses.plain: For he is our God; and we are the people of his pasture, and the sheep of his hand. To day if ye will hear his voice,

tokens.t: For he
our God; and we
the people of his pasture, and the sheep of his hand. To day if ye will hear his voice,

verses.plain: Harden not your heart, as in the provocation, and as in the day of temptation in the wilderness:

tokens.t: Harden not your heart, as in the provocation,
as
the day of temptation in the wilderness:

verses.plain: When your fathers tempted me, proved me, and saw my work.

tokens.t: When your fathers tempted me, proved me, and saw my work.

verses.plain: Forty years long was I grieved with this generation, and said, It is a people that do err in their heart, and they have not known my ways:

tokens.t: Forty years long was I grieved with
generation, and said, It
a people that do err in their heart, and they have not known my ways:

verses.plain: Unto whom I sware in my wrath that they should not enter into my rest.

tokens.t: Unto whom I sware in my wrath that they should not enter into my rest.

footnotes.text: the strength…: or, the heights of the hills are his
The sea…: Heb. Whose the sea is
that…: Heb. if they enter into my rest
